author: prbuzz.com
title: iFoneMate is a powerful data recovery software for iPhones and iPads and even iPods
text:
There are several reasons for a person to lose important data from their smartphones. Sometimes, data may get accidentally deleted from the phone and at other times, one’s iPhone may get infected by a virus. Many times, one also forgets their own password to access their iPhone and this may lead to them being locked out of their own phone.
In all of the aforementioned scenarios, getting access to data can be a difficult and expensive affair, however, with iFoneMate which is a powerful data recovery software is extremely easy and involves a three step process following which, one can get back all of their lost data with ease and efficiency. With this three step process, one can restore lost iPhone data and iPhone message recovery is also possible.
All that is needed to be done is to connect the device, which will then be scanned. Once the scanning process is complete, one can choose the files they’d like to retrieve, which will be stored in a folder on their computer.
The iFoneMate software works perfectly for iPhone, iPad and even iPod. Some of the very popular elements that can be recovered include the photos, messages, videos, contacts and other such elements directly. In extreme circumstances, iFoneMate also refers to iTunes Backup to retrieve deleted data from their iOS devices. It also ventures into the iCloud Backup segment in case the content required cannot be found on the concerned devices.
The software offers complete security and there is also a 24 hours service support for those who may have any problems accessing their content.
